    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_108728</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Force and mass relationship of a sliding box</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft und Masse Verhältnis eines gleitenden 
Kastens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force et rapport de la masse d'un cadre 
coulissant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força e relacionamento da massa de uma caixa 
deslizante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza e rapporto della massa di una casella 
scorrevole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη και μαζική σχέση ενός γλιστρώντας κιβωτίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza y lazo de la masa de un rectángulo que 
resbala</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the relationship between force required to move a box of a certain mass.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pulling force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sliding box</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt das Verhältnis 
zwischen der Kraft, die benötigt wird, um einen Kasten einer 
bestimmten Masse zu verschieben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre le rapport entre la 
force exigée pour déplacer un cadre d'une certaine masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra o relacionamento entre
a força requerida para mover uma caixa de alguma massa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra il rapporto fra 
forza richiesta per spostare una casella di certa massa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τη σχέση 
μεταξύ της δύναμης που απαιτείται για να κινήσει ένα κιβώτιο 
μιας ορισμένης μάζας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra el lazo entre la 
fuerza requerida para mover un rectángulo de cierta masa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ziehen der Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schieben des Kastens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de frottement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resbalar el rectángulo</string>
          </keyword>
